mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: H-hey! You’re from the ship, right? Obviously..

mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: Where is everybody else? Are they OK? Are you OK? God, what are we going to do...
...Calm down, kid.
I’ll tell you what I can but first, what’s your name?

mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: Okay… My name’s Jack.

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: Well mine’s John, how old are ya?

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: You do seem younger than most... Can you walk kid? We’re gonna have to get movin’ soon.

mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: Yea sure thing, all I got is my rifle to carry anyways...

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: Well be prepared to carry a heck of a lot more, we’re gonna set up shelter for the night. I’m gonna need you to gather wood for me...

mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: Why do we need to make shelter now? Shouldn’t we look for others?

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: We will, kid... Listen, I don’t know how long you’ve been out but we’ve been here for one night already, no clue how you’ve been restin’ easy till now… Aren’t you hungry?

mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: Now that you mention it, I’m starving… Have I really been out that long?

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: Seems like it... I was actually with a group last night. I was tasked with watching the shore in case more of us wash up…

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: By the time I had come back to check in with em’ this morning they were all gone… Not sure why or when they had moved but regardless, they couldn’t have made it far.

mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: Wait, they just disappeared? What could have happened?

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: Like I said, I don’t know. They wouldn’t have abandoned me for just no reason though…

mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: Alright… So is there anything else we know? Where are we?

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: No idea... Don’t know where we are or how the ship went down when it did. Just be sure to listen to me and we’ll work out fine, only a matter of time before someone finds us

mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: Alright John… So we need wood right?

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: That’s right, bring me back 8 pieces of wood and meet me back here. Once we have a fire and some shelter over our heads, we’ll think about food.

idleDialogue.speaker: John
idleDialogue.speech: Well, what are you waiting for? Just walk around and bring back some wood logs.
